case.title: Drinks - 28 (Ealing)
case.text:
Hiya
Plans for this evening have fallen through, so at a bit of a loose end tonight, so if you like the photo, and fancy a drink or to contact me.
I'm 28, live in west London with a couple of friends. Love to read as well, and watching films. Also quite like going to the gym, then balancing out the goodness by going out drinking with friends.
Thought this would be blatantly obvious, as i'm posting in the M4W section, but NO MEN!!!
